title: Tom Brady Working Out with Bucs + Tips for Scouting Live Games
itunes:title: Tom Brady Working Out with Bucs + Tips for Scouting Live Games
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a new episode. To start off, the guys are joined by Baseball Hall of Famer John Smoltz as he talks about what makes Michael Jordan and Tiger Woods special (5:05). Next, the pair react to LeBron James' comments of how he considered playing professional football during his basketball career and further look at how good LeBron would be as a football player (9:18). After that, the duo discuss the news of QB Tom Brady working out with his Bucs teammates and then the guys explain how the Bucs should use Brady (16:08). To wrap up the show, DJ pulls out old scouting documents with tips for scouting live games (23:34).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
